params.factory: Address of the factory to use
params.initialSupply: Total tokens to be minted (to this contract)
params.name: Token name
params.recipient: The address that will receive the newly minted tokens. Should only be set to address(this) when                   distributing tokens in the same transaction via multicall. For all other cases, use a different                   recipient address to avoid tokens being distributed by another caller
params.tokenData: Extra data needed by the factory

returns.tokenAddress: The address of the token that was created

params.payerIsUser: Whether the payer is the user
params.salt: The salt to pass into the distribution strategy contract if needed
params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to distribute

returns.distributionContract: The address of the distribution contract

params.originalCreator: The address that will be set as the original creator

returns.graffiti: The graffiti bytes32 that will be used

createToken(address,string,string,uint8,.notice: Creates and distributes tokens.      1) Deploys a token via chosen factory.      2) Distributes tokens via one or more strategies.

distributeToken(address,(address,uint128.notice: Transfer tokens already created to this contract and distribute them via one or more strategies

getGraffiti(address).notice: Calculates the graffiti that will be used for a token creation
